descriptionHtml:
[color=#FFA500]  This mod changes allot in skyrim it changes /bandits to pirates, giants to pirates,necro and skeletons to pirates and all pirates and bandits have crossbows also spriggans changed to giants and tamed mamaths changed to deer female elk changed to horse deer changed to cow so you are able to kill almost every animal for supply\'s. This mod is configured with Soolie mod Tropical Skyrim -- A Climate Overhaul  also wolfs are changed to husky\'s to soot the soolies mod and husky\'s are cooler also adds meat to wolfs and you need string to craft certain items you can get spider webs fron dead spiders and craft them into strings 

GOING DOWN IN 2 DAYS 
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
      [POSTPONE]

[REQUIRES DAWNGUARD]
